mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia Governor John S. Battle and his advisors visiting UVa Hospital wards
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The governor and his advisors visited the wards and heard UVa's requests for state money. Published in UVa Medical Alumni News Letter, October 1953.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
UVa Medical Alumni News Letter, volume October 1953
